name: BlisMobile
tag_list: mobile, apps, wi-fi, app-distribution, app-charts, mobile-marketing, global, media-owner, dsp, ad-serving, rich-media-advertising, sms, mms, nfc, bluetooth, wi-fi-advertising
overview:
BlisMobile are one of the worlds largest mobile media owners.

With over twelve years experience in mobile and a long working history with media buyers and media specialists, they run mobile campaigns for some of the most well known brands in the world.

Specialists in app distribution, DSP ad serving and OOH interactive media solutions, BlisMobile track and report to a granular level through a unique BlisOne optimisation platform.

BlisMobile have offices in London, Sydney and San Francisco and have a major global footprint reaching millions of mobile phones everyday.
